name: Hrvatski Višedionički forum za e-Račun
goal: The HReForum continues to promote the benefits of e-Invoicing to the Croatian Public Sector and the wider Croatian economy, meeting regularly in Ministry of Economy, Entrepreneurship and Crafts and engaging with Assistant Minister.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Direktiva 2014/55/EU Europskog Parlamenta i Vijeća od 16. travnja 2014. o elektroničkom izdavanju računa u javnoj nabavi
